title: Test Pilot
name: testpilot-addon
description: Test Pilot is a privacy-sensitive user research program focused on getting new features into Firefox faster.
author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)

scripts.prepackage: npm run lint && npm run lint:extension && npm run update-version
scripts.package: shx rm -rf web-ext-artifacts && cross-env web-ext build --ignore-files package.json package-lock.json bin/update-version README.md LICENSE --overwrite-dest && shx mv web-ext-artifacts/test_pilot-*.zip ./addon.xpi
